игра очень хорошая мне понравилась думою купить 2 часть

It may not be an FPS, but it is an excellent game.

The game itself is amazing, it's level design is great, it's story is amazing and well thought, the weapons in this game are.. One? The Portal Gun. It is a thing of beauty, a work of art, the way these Portals work is still a mystery to me, I honestly don't understand how were they made possible. Try to imagine a Personal Portal Gun of yours, how awesome would that be? Would be really expensive to buy, I can tell you that lol.

Such a heartwarming and sweet story game. Buy it when you can!
nice game

很好玩的游戏，打折期间就买了。不过我有一点点幽闭恐惧症，本作抛去玩法略微有点小压抑，空间小，要是真的受不了就别继续下去了。但如果能坚持，本作必会惊艳到你。
传送门的蓝黄门真的太好太好玩了，V社制作者的奇思妙想让人不得不佩服。游戏中期有段时间会很压抑，不过挺过那段时期游戏大概就要到尾声了。
而后面你就会发现一个很有意思的故事，而游戏给你带来的一切紧张的，恐惧的情绪都安排的恰到好处。
墙上的黑手印，红色油漆的指路标，
一切线索都告诉你，你不是第一个被实验人员，也不是第一个挑战AI的人
真的让人感到激动而且能引起玩家的幻想
我现在打算去打2了，2代的多人模式我很期待。总而言之1代玩法真的妙，剧情也很好。
虽然是比较早的游戏了，但依旧充满活力，是很棒的作品。
结局也有一个小彩蛋，很开心
谢谢观看，这游戏必入，兄弟们动起来！
通关撒花*★,°*:.☆(￣▽￣)/$:*.°★* 。

Muiito bom! Nota 10!

This game is great but playing the second one first makes this one feel a little strange. Portal 2 was a lot more creative with its environments and ideas. This game is still flawless by all accounts. The only problems I had were technical like occasional freezing. But the most jarring thing about this game is how short it is. I beat this game in a day where most single player games i start take me 6 months minimum to beat. You could say its a compliment that i found the main game so entertaining that i went through it that much faster becuase of how good it was or I got through it quick because of my prior expierence. But i also got this game for 2 dollars so cant complain too much. Great game
Me gusto
Amazing physics and puzzles that make you feel big brain after finishing them.
I would recommend this game to other players! It is a fantablous game. The puzzles are amazingly constructed with just a hint of creepiness that really brings the game together!

é um daqueles jogos diferentes, que não se vê por aí. Também possui uma história interessante por trás do desenvolvimento, onde a ideia começa em um trabalho acadêmico e acaba parando na equipe de desenvolvimento da Valve. Apesar de curto, ele é um bom jogo para quem quiser um game de puzzle físico em primeira pessoa.

This was a triumph
I'm making a note here: Huge success
It's hard to overstate my satisfaction
Aperture Science
We do what we must
Because we can
For the good of all of us
Except the ones who are dead

But there's no sense crying over every mistake
You just keep on trying till you run out of cake
And the science gets done
And you make a neat gun
For the people who are still alive

I'm not even angry
I'm being so sincere right now
Even though you broke my heart
And killed me
And tore me to pieces
And threw every piece into a fire
As they burned it hurt because I was so happy for you!

Now these points of data make a beautiful line
And we're out of beta
We're releasing on time
So I'm GLaD I got burned
Think of all the things we learned
For the people who are still alive

Go ahead and leave me
I think I prefer to stay inside
Maybe you'll find someone else to help you
Maybe Black Mesa
That was a joke
Haha! Fat chance
Anyway, this cake is great
It's so delicious and moist

Look at me still talking
When there's Science to do
When I look out there, it makes me GLaD I'm not you
I've experiments to run
There is research to be done
On the people who are still alive

And believe me, I am still alive
I'm doing Science and I'm still alive
I feel fantastic and I'm still alive
While you're dying, I'll be still alive
And when you're dead, I will be still alive
Still alive
Still alive

Невероятно атмосферная игра с интересными головоломками и революционной механикой. Сюжетом игра не блещет (в рамках первой части), но способна вызвать чувство интереса и желание обо всём разузнать. Также, ощущение, что за тобой всегда наблюдают не прекращается всю игру. Это заставляет тебя не на шутку встревожиться, а в некоторые моменты может начать пугать. Советую поиграть всем!
